PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-07972013-06-12HRSDC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Disability Savings Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Disability Savings Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA DISABILITY SAVINGS REGULATIONS in order to ensure that all Registered Disability Savings Plan beneficiaries receive timely grant and bond payments by removing the 180 day requirement from the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0131 Publication Date: 2013-07-03
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canada Disability Savings Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADA DISABILITY SAVINGS REGULATIONS in order to ensure that all Registered Disability Savings Plan beneficiaries receive timely grant and bond payments by removing the 180 day requirement from the Regulations.
